The rules are simple and easy to pick up. All you need is to match 3 tiles with the same vivid picture, for instance, 3 bells or 3 grass. Clear the board from all the tiles to go to the next level.

Matching games can be tricky, but normally they have some common tile connect mechanics. After all, you still need to connect the tiles with pictures, right? Most free tile games have quite similar rules. And here’s ours.

HOW TO PLAY OUR TILES GAME
Well, you should match 3 tiles with the same image. Just tap to put them into the stack. Three same tiles will be matched and removed from the stack.
When you clear the board, you win. Keep practicing to become a real tile master one day.
You fail, if you don't get at least one merge for seven tiles in your stack. Remember: you have a maximum of seven moves to make one combination of three tiles. Each tile link move matters.

summary.label:
“太好了，我們終於不用流浪了嗚嗚嗚。”
這是一群在外流浪多年的動物們發自內心的喜悅。
在這裡，你將帶領他們來到一座未開發的島嶼，通過開荒擴土、探索採集、交易經營、拓海跑商，獲取豐富的物資資源，創造出一個充滿自由和童話的夢幻世界。讓動物們不再顛沛流離，從此過上安定自足的生活！

【開闊地圖，裝扮世界】
白雪盡情地揮灑於萬物，無盡的寒意使天地界限逐漸模糊。
澄澈水面映照著櫻花樹，偶然飄落粉色花瓣泛起層層漣漪。
城市擁有建築，工廠，裝飾物等3000餘個。土地和雪地；平面和高層；白天和夜晚；一起都會呈現出不同的唯美意境！
哐當！看我挖到了什麼？世界地圖裡竟然有寶藏，一起來尋寶呀。

【動物養成，圖鑒收集】
城市建設需要招募更多動物，動物專屬特長為工廠生產、拓荒、建築搭建、釣魚等活動線上自己的一份力。但是想讓他們工作的話，必須要住上動物公寓哦。
長頸鹿喜歡和伴侶看日落，所以他在家裡開了兩個天窗探頭欣賞。
企鵝家裡不買電視和冰箱，因為她就是電視，她伴侶就是冰箱。
樹懶是著名的路癡，總找不到回家的路……
獨具個性的動物們在城市裡穿梭遊走，歡迎來撩！

【經營系統，放置玩法】
工廠樹會長出很多美食！有香甜美味的南瓜派、醇香濃郁的咖啡、柔軟酸甜的草莓聖代……把這些食物拿去訂單交易，能獲得大量的金幣和建築材料哦。
另外，眾多訂單裡面有一份特殊的訂單，是熊貓墩墩周遊世界的時候順便帶去交易的。有空可以翻看墩墩的旅行日記，特別有意思。     遊戲的養成系統簡單易上手，升級和解鎖都由玩家自己選擇，等級樹只要放置動物居民研究即可完成升級解鎖。如果想經營好城市，那做好時間管理，合理安排好動物工作！


【共同建設，家園合併】
遊戲設定中有共同建設的玩法。
玩家能委託好友裝飾自己的城市，解鎖家族後能邀請家族成員合併家園島，自由建設共同展現家族的魅力。家族中每個族員都可以通過挖礦、跑商、釣魚、遠征獲得家族貢獻獲得豐富的裝飾資源。


【個性裝飾，自由度高】
玩家角色形象、城市、家園庭院和室內，你都可以進行diy。無論是一條馬路、一張椅子、乃至一棵草，都需要你來搭建。遊戲內室內外裝飾主題應有盡有，室外的瑰麗海洋、夏日海灘、浪漫婚禮……室內的森林風、少女風等等，一鍵解決不會裝飾的煩惱！

最後，跟隨你內心的靈感，按照你的想法，大膽建造屬於你的城市吧！

上古時期流傳著火鳳的傳說，它於火中涅槃，於亂世群雄中選擇心靈至純的人轉世重生。
為家國大義、為兩國邦交、為黎民百姓的安寧、而甘於犧牲自己的孫尚香被火鳳選中
孫尚香擁有了火鳳的力量，獲得了火鳳賜予的百鳥朝鳳弓，立誓將用烈火燃盡罪惡，守護百姓安寧，被百姓譽為火鳳神女。

其射出的箭更能引來百鳥朝鳳，百鳥降落將爆發化身為各路神將。而每次弓箭射出都將爆出超多位不同的五星金將，最多一次召喚了上千位名將。可謂，一人可頂千軍萬馬，一人就是一個軍隊！

矜名妒能的各路諸侯都渴望擁有這個能力，通過百鳥朝鳳弓，獲得神將超爆之力，加速自己統一三國的步伐。
火鳳神女一方面要守護百姓，一方面要與諸侯抗衡，一直祈禱能有心懷天下的少主出現。希望在少主的帶領下，利用火鳳的超爆之力和千將之術拯救天下蒼生。

=====遊戲特色=====

「一千連抽 超爆福利」
超爆福利官林心如傾情推薦，開局一千連抽，玩爆三國。再送十萬金錠，助你招兵買馬。超多資源福利，天天登錄天天領。

「休閒護肝 非氪福音」
放置掛機，不上線也能獲得大量獎勵。所有玩法提前佈置好陣容，下線自動參與，上線即可領取收益。

「超多搭配 超級爽玩」
魏蜀吳神魔五大陣營，猛將、鎮衛、謀臣、方士四大武將類型，爆發流、控制流、燃火流...等超多陣容搭配，助你上陣殺敵，超級暴擊，超級爽玩！

「全天跨服 隨時參戰」
全天開啟跨服玩法，漕運風雲，礦場爭奪，聯盟對陣，國戰攻城略地，隨時沉浸體驗三國紛爭的緊張代入感。

「寫實畫風 正統三國」
最前沿動畫製作技術，武將刻畫栩栩如生，酷炫戰鬥場景，讓謀略和武力的三國世界更加豐滿，延續傳統三國世界觀，復刻原汁原味的正統三國。

summary.label:
「男子做得，女子亦能。」
女子掌權的世界，會是什麼樣貌？

一輛馬車停在官府門口，車裡下來了位妙齡女子，今日正是入宮參加考試之日。女子的表情流露出些許不安，卻依舊舉步邁入考場。終究皇天不付苦心人，她不僅獲取佳績更受封官職。以為日後將平步青雲之時，豈知世事難料，官場上的針鋒相對、旁人居心叵測的目光…

誰能料想到這位不被看好的小小女官，將會對朝堂掀起滔天巨浪。

【執筆辦案，明辨是非】
體驗朝廷辦案的快感，親自在案發現場找尋線索，並揭發隱藏的反派角色，將貪官繩之以法、剷奸除惡。

【寄情予你，名仕伴遊】
日後與你相伴的戀愛對象，有武術高強的瀟灑公子、青梅竹馬的藥堂少主、孤芳自賞的翩然主君…等，數種戀愛的對象任意選擇。

【軟萌寵物，輕鬆養成】
在遊戲中你能在路上巧遇：身材圓潤的小倉鼠、有著大耳朵的小狐狸、活潑好動的小鸚鵡及其他可愛寵物們，只要你喜歡，通通都能帶回家！

【時裝打扮，自由搭配】
數百套華美時裝任你搭，今天想穿哪套就哪套，更能自訂角色妝容，清純？高冷？樣樣都難不倒，風格萬變隨心配。

【打造宅院，悠閒種田】
豐富的家園系統，除了自由佈置外，還能在家中傳授課業、放養小動物，更有田畝可以任意栽種，輕鬆賣菜也能發家致富。

【多人同樂，杜絕孤獨】
一個人玩遊戲沒意思？家族、結誼、師徒等多樣社交系統，輕鬆結識其他玩家並一同暢遊，讓你的官場生活歡樂加倍不孤單！

Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

Thus begins your journey across Teyvat to seek answers from The Seven — the gods of each element. Along the way, prepare to explore every inch of this wondrous world, join forces with a diverse range of characters, and unravel the countless mysteries that Teyvat holds...

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Climb any mountain, swim across any river, and glide over the world below, taking in the jaw-dropping scenery each step of the way. And if you stop to investigate a wandering Seelie or strange mechanism, who knows what you might discover?

ELEMENTAL COMBAT SYSTEM

Harness the seven elements to unleash elemental reactions. Anemo, Electro, Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, Dendro, and Geo interact in all sorts of ways, and Vision wielders have the power to turn this to their advantage.

Will you vaporize Hydro with Pyro, electro-charge it with Electro, or freeze it with Cryo? Your mastery of the elements will give you the upper hand in battle and exploration.

BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

Feast your eyes on the world around you, with a stunning art style, real-time rendering, and finely tuned character animations delivering you a truly immersive visual experience. Lighting and weather all change naturally over time, bringing every detail of this world to life.

SOOTHING SOUNDTRACK

Let the beautiful sounds of Teyvat draw you in as you explore the expansive world around you. Performed by the world's top orchestras such as London Philharmonic Orchestra and Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, the soundtrack changes seamlessly with the time and gameplay to match the mood.

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM

Team up with a diverse cast of characters in Teyvat, each with their own unique personalities, stories, and abilities. Discover your favorite party combinations and level up your characters to help you conquer even the most daunting of enemies and domains.

JOURNEY WITH FRIENDS

Team up with friends across various platforms to trigger more elemental action, tackle tricky boss fights, and conquer challenging domains together to reap rich rewards.

As you stand atop the peaks of Jueyun Karst and take in the rolling clouds and vast terrain stretching out before you, you may wish to stay in Teyvat a little longer... But until you are reunited with your lost sibling, how can you rest? Go forth, Traveler, and begin your adventure!

SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com


***COMPATIBILITY***

Requires iOS 12.0 or later

Compatible with iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone SE (2nd Generation), iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 mini, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPad Air（3rd Generation), iPad mini (5th Generation), iPad Pro (2nd Generation) 12.9-inch, iPad Pro (2nd Generation) 10.5-inch, iPad Pro (3rd Generation) 11-inch, iPad Pro (3rd Generation) 12.9-inch, iPad Pro (4th Generation) 11-inch, iPad Pro (4th Generation) 12.9-inch, iPad Air (4th Generation), iPad (8th Generation), iPad mini (6th Generation), iPad (9th Generation)

山重水複疑無路，柳暗花明又一村!
在兵戈擾攘、百家爭鬥的武林江湖中，這裡有處恍若五柳先生筆下的世外桃源
你無需煩憂紅塵瑣事，不必角逐世俗功利

沏壺酒、煮碗粥，收拾紛亂疲憊的心，將生活點滴譜寫成日記，只需放鬆自己，享受這不一樣的江湖



《江湖悠悠》打破以往所有武俠遊戲的玩法，
全新首款田園系武俠，種下幸福的種子，準備美味的菜肴，與你的少俠一起到江湖世界各地旅行，
上百種江湖風景，上千種旅行事件，精彩豐富的江湖秘聞，在最放鬆的家園，享受你的悠閒時光! 


【遊戲特色】


【帶上行囊，與少俠一起出發旅行】

跟著性格獨特的少俠，一同遊歷廣袤的江湖世界－
不同於傳統武俠，你無法全然控制少俠的生活；你的少俠或許會在子夜飛簷走壁、御劍擊破宵小的突襲、會在雪中獨釣江雪、拎起行囊遠赴絕景、傷痕累累歷劫歸來；他會為發現菜譜感到開心、會為盜匪欺民感到憤怒、會為故人離去感到哀傷……你會從旁伴隨少俠的成長，一起經歷旅途中的喜怒哀樂。



【超唯美武俠，3D 還原世外桃源之景】
人人都有理想中的桃花源！季節場景真實還原－成隊小鴨遊過春暖江水、點點螢光閃爍盛夏林間；成熟果實結滿入秋枝頭；皚皚白雪砌滿寒冬水面。隨著四季更迭，你還能為少俠悠悠換上各種時節的服裝，在家園掛上一盞花燈、種下一顆櫻樹、以梅花妝點外牆、用墨竹打造床鋪……帶回各地建材製作裝飾，盡情發揮創意，打造屬於自己的世外桃源吧！



【療癒系武俠，愛恨情仇皆為紅塵】
相逢何必曾相識？有緣千里來相聚！有別於傳統武俠的暴戾之氣，在這裡你能通過與市井小民對話、收到村民來信、出遊偶遇等多種敘事方式，閱覽深藏在這片田園江湖的人物故事，加深與人們的情感連結。且不僅於此！你還能寫下自己的江湖見聞公開分享，甚至能續寫他人未完成的故事！在這裡你能細細品嘗愜意生活，打造一個治癒心靈、有人情溫度的江湖！



【煙火人間，結交好友一起享受】

這裡沒有傳統武俠的幫會，只有自然聚集而成的村落。村民之間彼此扶持，共禦外患。不求武林第一、不爭排名貢獻，大夥僅是圍起籬笆種田養魚、拿起刀劍抵禦盜匪入侵，並在煙花齊放的廣場共用盛宴；除此之外，亦能備酒備菜招待造訪家園的好友，到對方家中贈花祈福。在這裡你能放慢腳步，等一封遠方來信，等一盞流水河燈，體驗不一樣的「慢社交」生活。



【倚劍天涯，闖蕩武林江湖】
執一劍深藏功與名！遊戲共有六大門派，風格與招式任你體驗，上千種技能任你挑選，在這裡你也可以是一位退隱的絕世高手，戰鬥在過招時仍然刀劍凌厲，翻轉騰挪招架格擋，劍光火石間捕捉破綻，終結技一擊定勝負! 

【田園武俠生活，探索上百種美食】

在獨一無二的家園內，你能耕種小麥、稻穀等作物，並自由組合食材研發新菜色。這些美食貫穿廣袤河山及中華歷史，超過百種配方等你探索！還有釀酒、煉藥、種果樹、養雞與寵物培養等經營玩法豐富你的田園生活！現在就乘上輕舟，駛向屬於你的桃花源！

Boasting an epic soundtrack that can turn the world of gaming on its head, and some of the most stunning designs ever seen in a game, Bank of Innovation’s newest title, MementoMori, is finally here! 

Songs performed by many renowned artists enhance the rich world of MementoMori. 
*We recommend playing while wearing earphones or headphones. 

◆ STORY: 
A tale of “justice” woven by girls whose fragile hearts verge on shattering... 

There are girls who many call “witches.” 
Although they themselves are ordinary, they can wield slightly extraordinary powers. 
However, when calamity spreads throughout the land, witches begin to be feared and detested. 
Before long, the Church of Longinus commenced what would be known as “The Witch Hunt.” 

“Witches are to blame for this calamity. If we kill them, then the calamity will vanish along with them!” 

Witches are executed one by one. 
But one day, as madness seizes control of the world, it is suddenly overrun by “Curses.” 
A country incinerated by hellfire. A kingdom consumed by crystals. An empire purged by the Tree of Life. 
Such are the woeful desires of those who are called “Witches of Qlipha.” 
Without any means to defend themselves, nation after nation falls into ruin, until finally— 
The fractured land is sent adrift high into the sky. 

Meanwhile, the people have yet to take notice. 
From within these girls cursed to be witches, there emanates glimmers of hope. 
In order to save their decimated world, these girls set forth liberating the land from darkness. 
For they believe that it is the right thing to do...

summary.label:
【遊戲介紹】
《第五人格》是網易首款非對稱性對抗競技手遊。荒誕哥德畫風，懸疑燒腦劇情，刺激的1V4非對稱的對抗玩法，都將給玩家帶來全新的遊戲體驗。玩家將成為偵探奧爾菲斯，在收到一封神秘的委託信後，進入惡名昭著的莊園調查一件失蹤案。在進行證據調查過程中，奧爾菲斯將採用演繹法，對案情進行回顧。在案情回顧時，玩家可以選擇扮演監管者或求生者，展開激烈的對抗。而在調查的過程，無限接近事實時，卻發現越來越不可思議的真相。

【遊戲特色】
-非對稱對抗玩法 心跳的追逃體驗
玩家在遊戲中可扮演求生者和監管者兩種角色，四個求生者的目標是破譯5個密碼機從大門逃脫，監管者的目標則是淘汰所有的求生者。遊戲中，玩家利用角色的專屬技能或者道具，在一場場追逃遊戲中感受心跳的刺激與策略對決的暢快。

-狂歡莊園故事  曲折離奇案件重現
“……就像一頭即將被深淵溺斃的野獸，一邊將自己偽裝成怪物，害怕將其他人捲入其中，一邊卻又渴望著救贖……”在幽暗深處的莊園裡，眾多的受邀者在遊戲狂歡過後仍未意識到自己身處於黑暗的漩渦中，再也分不清善良與邪惡。

-哥德式黑暗畫風 荒誕詭異升級
烏鴉盤旋在夜空，霧氣彌漫的樹林，在神秘莫測的遊戲氛圍中，演繹埋藏在高加索山脈群中一起不為人知的連環案件。維多利亞時代的史實元素，暗黑布偶化的人物角色，黑白懷舊的動畫風格，真相默默隱於表像的細節之中。

-個性角色蒐集 多種職業技能搭配
每個角色的背後都藏著不為人知的故事，或是為了金錢，或是為了恩怨，或是為了愛情，他們同時受邀來到這個神秘莊園。玩家通過代入進遊戲角色，重演案件發生時的過程進行線索推演，案件真相的迷霧不會永遠籠罩。

單打獨鬥的路, 只會越來越窄; 選擇志向道合的人, 就是選擇成功。創建或加入聯盟, 與盟友一起互幫互助, 共同發展, 聯合殺敵! 在聯盟的幫助下, 由你指揮下的蟻國必能在這螞蟻世界的頂端佔有一席之地!

summary.label:
Have you wanted to catch a fish, but you couldn't go to your favorite fishing spots? Have you been dissatisfied with casual fishing games? Play Fishing Clash – a free multiplayer fishing game chosen by millions of anglers and bring fishing and life together! 

Fishing Clash mixes the best features of multiplayer fishing games: the realism of simulator games, the competitiveness of sports games & the social aspect of fishing and hunting apps. With fishing spots from all over the world, it's the most realistic simulator amongst multiplayer fishing games.

How to quickly catch a fish in Fishing Clash?
• Launch the game.
• Tap the ""Cast"" button in the bottom-right corner.
• Tap the ""Strike"" button continuously to ensure the line tension indicator is in the center of the top bar.
• Enjoy the look of the fish on your fishing hook!

What's next?
• Relax, catch more fish, or win matches in exciting multiplayer duel mode.
• Take part in multiplayer challenges and championships.
• Upgrade your lure cards to level up and unlock new fishing spots.
• Conquer the fishing world!

Fishing around the world
In this multiplayer simulator, you can find a fishery almost everywhere: from the Florida Coast and the Kenai River to Lake Biwa, Galapagos, and Loch Ness. Here you can find a fishery almost everywhere in the world! Catch lots of fish like bass, carp, trout, and even some monster fish from the Deep Sea!

Collect and upgrade lure cards
Winning duels or getting top positions in championships will reward you with packs of lure cards. Collect them like in collectible card games and upgrade them to catch bigger fish! The bigger they are, the bigger the chance to win competitive multiplayer games and fishing world cup tournaments!

A simulator with real-time duels
Feel the thrill of multiplayer games and play a fishing duel against other anglers. You'll need not only skills but also your wits! Become a fishing master, get the biggest catch on your fishing hook and win every fishing battle.

Take part in live events
Every day you can hunt for amazing rewards like new rods, lure cards, and skill tokens in daily or weekly events. Pass the fishing trial, challenge angry sharks, become a catfish hunter or a traveler catching the biggest fish on a few different fishing spots!

Join or create a clan
Although Fishing Clash is a simulator at its heart, it enables ways to socialize like in free fishing apps. Meet fellow anglers, chat, exchange (or donate!) lure cards, and work together for great rewards in multiplayer Clan Wars.

The better the skills, the better your catch
All fishing spots have their skill tree. Use skill tokens to unlock new skills and get bonuses for fish of all rarities, and more!

Breathtaking fishing locations
Whether you prefer fly fishing, ice fishing, or trolling, you'll admire the look of all fishing spots. Every fishery in Fishing Clash features beautiful 3D vistas and hand-crafted fish you'll love to see on your fishing hook. It's a realistic simulator, after all.

Fresh, new content every week!
New fish, new fishery, new rods: in this realistic simulator, you can find new content every week, so there's no shortage of fish to catch! Bring fishing and life together!

Whether you're a seasoned angler or a multiplayer simulation games fan, Fishing Clash is a great casual time-killer. With dozens of fishing spots worldwide and hundreds of fish species, it offers an excellent experience for anybody looking for a realistic fishing simulator. DOWNLOAD NOW!
